title: Non-Renew a High-Risk Policy
description: An underwriter has decided not to renew a homeowner's policy due to an unacceptable number of claims.

tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter confirms the policy has had 4 water claims in 3 years, which exceeds the risk threshold.

tasks.description: Document the reason for non-renewal in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter logs 'Excessive Claims Frequency' as the reason.

tasks.description: Generate and send the legally required notice of non-renewal to the policyholder in advance of the renewal date.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal non-renewal notice is mailed to the customer within the legally mandated timeframe.
